name: VARatio
description: VARatio analyzes video files for variable aspect ratios (e.g. IMAX scenes in Interstellar, The Dark Knight) and writes a custom .var file alongside the movie to encode the timing and ratio of each detected change. Black frames and fade transitions are handled gracefully.
overview: Detect variable aspect ratios in movies and generate .var timing files
